title: I Plugged A Graphics Card Into My NAS...
description: *Video Sponsor*: Thanks Brilliant.org. Want to learn cool stuff? Try Brilliant.org at no cost for 30 days. The first 200 people to sign up with this link:  can get 20% off an annual plan!   I plugged a GPU into my NAS and it finally worked!  Here is an affiliate link to the little Asustor AS6704T   Get some AWESOME Dawid T-shirts, Mouse pads and more here:   Play some Minecraft on the Dawid Does Minecraft server courtesy of our friends at Linode! Dawid Does Minecraft Name: Mctenthiddy, server IP: mc.tenthiddy.com It works on Java version 1.19.3  Support the channel on Patreon:    *Follow me on whichever Social media you don't hate* Discord:  Twitch:  Twitch bits on YouTube:

I've been enjoying their 'how large language models work' course, which starts off by teaching you how to identify AI generated content. Nice!
